org.lainsoft.forge.persistance.io.reader

Class XMLBeanReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lainsoft.forge.persistance.io.reader.XMLBeanReader

  • public class XMLBeanReader
extends java.lang.Object
    General Reader for mapping xml to java beans.

    This class can not be inherited, so if you need to write an especialized reader make a wrapper, or implement a new reader.

      • read

        public java.lang.Object read(java.lang.String source,
                    java.lang.Class beanClass)
                      throws java.beans.IntrospectionException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Read xml file and map to an bean
        Parameters:
        source - URI to the xml data to be parsed.
        beanClass - Bean class representing the xml to be parsed.
        Returns:
        An instance of the Bean that represents the xml.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occured.
        java.beans.IntrospectionException - If an exception happens during Introspection.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If an exception occures while parsing xml.

        Read xml file and map to an bean

        Returns:
        An instance of the Bean that represents the xml.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occured.
        java.beans.IntrospectionException - If an exception happens during Introspection.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If an exception occures while parsing xml.
